item.title: Report E-2025040467
item.description:
Report E-2025040467

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-25
  • City: WATERFORD TOWNSHIP
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately two (2) gallons of material released from two (2) 5-gallon metal pails due to improperly loaded freight that resulted in the pails being crushed. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area and gathered the spent material, along with PPE, and containerized it into one (1) 5-gallon poly drum. One (1) 5-gallon poly drum was used to containerize the damaged pails. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
